name: David Ramirez
text: Well, he was trying to fix the history he'd mess up by jumping into whoever, so that he didn't change it. I would've given up on trying to get back home after taking the place of a person with a decent enough life.    If B, yeah, totally not worth it. I'd only do it if I was trying to prevent or solve some apocalyptic problem of our time, like in 12 Monkeys. If it's incidental, what for? It might be fun and historically valuable to *watch* the past through a tachyon viewer, but going back in the B situation is all risk with little chance of reward.
